          <title>
            <string language="en">Glucose solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glukoselösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solution de glucose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solução de glucose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soluzione di glucosio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λύση γλυκόζης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Solución de glucosa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows glucose dissolved in water. The solution contains very small particles which cannot scatter white light.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glucose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Scatter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Glukose, die im Wasser 
aufgelöst wird. Die Lösung enthält sehr Teilchen, die nicht 
weißes Licht zerstreuen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le glucose dissous dans
l'eau. La solution contient les particules très petites qui ne 
peuvent pas disperser la lumière blanche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o glucose dissolvido na 
água. A solução contem as partículas muito pequenas que não
podem dispersar a luz branca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il glucosio dissolto in
acqua. La soluzione contiene le particelle molto piccole che non
possono spargere la luce bianca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γλυκόζη που διαλύεται στο
ύδωρ. Η λύση περιέχει τα πολύ μικρά μόρια που δεν μπορούν
να διασκορπίσουν το άσπρο φως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la glucosa disuelta en 
agua. La solución contiene las partículas muy pequeñas que no
pueden dispersar la luz blanca.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lösen Sie sich auf</string>
          </keyword>
